name: The Fun Hit Wonders:  BACK TO COOL
description: The Fun Hit Wonders, are a fresh new musical experience with a multi-generational sound that’s fun for the whole family. From pre-schoolers’ to grandparents, finally some music that everyone can sing to, dance with and have fun with together. The Fun Hit Wonders consist of Disco Dog , Hippie Hippo, Punky Parrot, and Grungy Gorillia. They have taken popular children’s songs that once were cute but are now stale and revived them in a fresh, hip new way that parents and children will both enjoy. TRACK LISTING 1. WHEELS ON THE BUS 2. ABC’S 3. HICKORY DICKORY DOCK 4. TWINKLE TWINKLE LITTLE STAR 5. BA BA BLACK SHEEP 6. PEAUT BUTTER AND JELLY 7. ROW YOUR BOAT 8. PAT-A-CAKE 9. FIVE LITTLE MONKEYS 10. THE ITSY BITSY SPIDER 11. POP GOES THE WEASEL 12. IF YOU’RE HAPPY AND YOU KNOW IT
